creator: luke.torjussen@googlemail.com
text:
The command line for NUnit to include/exclude tests of certain categories is specified as a comma separated string.
e.g. if I want to include test categories ATests, BTests and CTests I do:
"/include:ATests,BTests,CTests"
But using the nunit task produces "/include:,ATests,BTests,CTests"

Created attachment 26512
java patch

moved repeated code for creating comma separated string into separate method as well as fixing bug
creator: luke.torjussen@googlemail.com

text:
This has actually already been fixed in svn with svn revision 752525 
but I took your patch as inspiration to factor out the redundant code
a little.  svn revision 1061884

Given the fix for this embarrasing bug has been in svn for almost two years
it may finally be time to think about a new release.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
